channel.title: TF 4092 on Open Knowledge HMFT-ITB
channel.description: Recent content in TF 4092 on Open Knowledge HMFT-ITB

item.description: Soal 1 The following equation describe the decomposition of potassium chlorate to produce oxygen gas. \[ 2\ KClO_3 \longrightarrow 2\ KCl + 3\ O_2 \] Approximately how many grams of \(KClO_3\) must be used to produce \(6.5 \text{ L}\) of \(O_2\) gas measured at \(7200 \text{ torr}\) and \(35^\circ \text{C}\)? 159.0 g 17.4 g 2.0 g 299.5 g 199.7 g Solusi Solusi 1 [...] [...]
